snippet.title: Alone in the Dark | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Alone in the Dark is OUT NOW!

A disturbing letter sent by a missing person. An asylum shrouded in intrigue, guarding a terrible secret.

Private investigator Edward Carnby and his client Emily Hartwood find themselves in a desperate struggle for survival as reality starts to crumble around them.

Immerse yourself in a deep psychological story created by cult horror writer Mikael Hedberg (SOMA, Amnesia) and experience this nightmare from the perspective of one of two protagonists, brought to life by Hollywood talent Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow).

Original Track composed by Jason Köhnen (The Lovecraft Sextet). Saxophone by Colin Webster.

- Links & Info -  
Steam: https://thqn.net/aitd-steam 
PS5: https://thqn.net/aitd-psn
Xbox Series: https://thqn.net/aitd-xbox
Website: https://aloneinthedark.com  
Discord: https://discord.gg/aloneinthedark 

- Our Socials -  
YouTube: https://youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AITDGame 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/aloneinthedarkgame 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/thqnordic  

#AloneInTheDark #ReturnToDerceto
